name: Zuppa di semi di loto e uova d'uccello speciale del Festival delle lanterne
desc: Traditional cuisine made to celebrate Lantern Rite. The clear, gold colors of the egg custard have been embellished with several lotus roots. Regardless of whether it is breakfast or a post-meal snack, its superior nutritional value can greatly nourish the body.
iconUrl: https://bbs.hoyolab.com/hoyowiki/picture/object/Lantern Rite Special Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup_icon.png

value.text: Lantern Rite Special Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
Decreases all party members' sprinting Stamina consumption by 25% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
